contentrichtext.text: A '''draped garment''' is a [[clothing|garment]] that is made of unstitched [[cloth]] that is held to the body by means of [[pin]]s, [[Fibulae and ancient brooches|fibulae]], or clasps, [[sash]]es or [[belt (clothing)|belt]]s, tying, or [[friction]] and gravity alone. Many draped garments are one-piece garments. == Examples == Examples of draped garments include: * traditional [[kilt]]s and [[belted plaid]]s * [[Chiton (costume)|chitons]] * [[loincloth]]s * [[toga]]s * [[stola]]s * [[sari]]s * [[sarong]]s * [[pareo]]s * [[dhoti]]s * [[poncho]]s * [[cloak]]s * [[shawl]]s == See also == * [[Drapery]] == External links == * [http://www.idcw.org.uk/ Institute of Draped Clothes] [[Category:Clothing by material]]
